attributes.action: Address air conditioning as a solution to the superbig, superbug crisis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Not only attention to hygiene, made more difficullt by rising bed occupancy and worsening staff : bed ratios, but a dry (clean) environment is significant in reducing infection rates. Therefore, the petitioner is calling on the P.M. :

1. To ensure all new hospitals have suitable air conditioning 

2. Consider investment into upgrading air conditioning in current hospitals

3. Give clearer guidelines on timetabling cleaning (NOT when wounds are being dressed)
